contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Woven from 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton, our waffle robe is inspired by the classic style found in spas across the globe. Lightweight, super soft, and highly absorbent, this robe will be your favorite post-shower and get-ready accessory.
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Turkish Waffle Robe

content.value: Add a pair of Organic Turkish Waffle Slippers to your order for just $14.90 $24.90

Woven from 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton, our waffle robe is inspired by the classic style found in spas across the globe. Generously sized, lightweight, super soft, and highly absorbent, this robe will be your favorite post-shower and get-ready accessory.
100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton
Our robe is sized for a perfect fit after washing and drying - please launder before use
If you prefer a more snug fit, we suggest sizing down
Robe is accented with kimono collar, 2 patch pockets, and a self-tie sash
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Model is 5'8'' and wearing a size small in white, size medium in grey
Made with care in Turkey

Machine wash cool with like colors using mild laundry detergent. Avoid washing with items that have zippers, Velcro, hooks, or other sharp objects that could snag or pull the loops. In the event of a snagged loop, cut it with scissors. Avoid contact with skin care products to prevent discoloration. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton
  • Our robe is sized for a perfect fit after washing and drying - please launder before use
  • If you prefer a more snug fit, we suggest sizing down
  • Robe is accented with kimono collar, 2 patch pockets, and a self-tie sash
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Model is 5'8'' and wearing a size small in white, size medium in grey
  • Made with care in Turkey

Generously sized, lightweight, super soft, and highly absorbent, this robe will be your favorite post-shower and get-ready accessory.
